name: happy-hour-in-for-the-night
title: Happy Hour: In For The Night
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• If you’re traveling next week for Thanksgiving, you’re not alone! Almost one million Tennesseans will be packing their bags and driving/flying more than 50 miles for the holiday weekend according to AAA. This is a bit more than the past few years, so between that and the TSA groping, you may want to get to the airport a little early. [Tennessean]
  • Did you know that the world’s largest treehouse (well, supposedly) is in Clarksville Crossville? We didn’t either! It spans seven trees, packs 10,000 square feet and sits 100 feet off the ground. [WKRN]
  • MTA and RTA will be doing their part for the holiday season tomorrow by setting up a food drive at Music City Central. If you’re one of the first 1,000 folks to donate, you’ll get a 1-ride bus ticket. [Tennessean]
  • We can’t find any other Happy Hour-appropriate news, so please go enjoy a nice cup of hot cocoa on our behalf and come back to see us tomorrow.
